first_meeting.speaker: Twitchy Pete
first_meeting.text: Hey... hey you. You got a light? A smoke? Anything?

first_meeting.speaker: Twitchy Pete
first_meeting.text: Been down here three days. Or weeks. Time's weird in the basement levels.

return_no_cigarette.speaker: Twitchy Pete
return_no_cigarette.text: *twitches* Back again? Still need that smoke...

refuse_cigarette.speaker: Twitchy Pete
refuse_cigarette.text: Yeah... yeah, later. I'll be here. Always here.

ask_about_place.speaker: Twitchy Pete
ask_about_place.text: Hell Night Club, baby. 1F is the lobby. B1 is where things get... interesting.

ask_about_place.speaker: Twitchy Pete
ask_about_place.text: B2? *laughs nervously* Don't go to B2. Not yet.

after_cigarette.speaker: Twitchy Pete
after_cigarette.text: *takes a long drag* Ahhhhh... that's the stuff.

after_cigarette.speaker: Twitchy Pete
after_cigarette.text: You're alright, kid. Name's Pete. Twitchy Pete, they call me.

after_cigarette.speaker: Twitchy Pete
after_cigarette.text: Used to be a DJ upstairs before... well, before I found B2.

after_cigarette.speaker: Twitchy Pete
after_cigarette.text: Word of advice? The bouncer at the stairs likes menthols. Just saying.

after_cigarette_return.speaker: Twitchy Pete
after_cigarette_return.text: *puffs contentedly* Hey, it's my favorite delivery person.

after_cigarette_return.speaker: Twitchy Pete
after_cigarette_return.text: Need directions? B1 stairs are past the bar. Watch out for the bartender though.

burned.speaker: Twitchy Pete
burned.text: My... my beautiful face... I used to be a DJ, you know...

burned.speaker: Twitchy Pete
burned.text: *whimpers* Just... just get away from me.

burned_return.speaker: Twitchy Pete
burned_return.text: I don't want anything from you. Ever.

burned_return.speaker: Twitchy Pete
burned_return.text: *touches scarred face* Some delivery person you are...
